(Forgot to include Eclipse)

::Eclipse::

    He noticed the sent of CyberS=
hark falling from the air. He started to race after it.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: David Torrey 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursd=
ay, October 12, 2000 8:55 PM
  Subject: Re: Battera is enraged.


  ::Cyber=
Shark/Eclipse::

      He got Battera's comm and was happy, maybe now she w=
as willing to leave the Alliance. And if he could get her out then he could=
 carry out his plans privately, without worry for her. He raced down the ha=
ll and out the door. He stopped in front of Zardus.
      "I'm going to get=
 Battera," He said while firing at the attackers (If they are still there i=
f not then he stares into Zardus's optics) "I'll convince her."
      He le=
ft without telling Zardus what he really ment. As soon as he was out of sca=
nner and optical range he cloaked. He then transformed to flight mode and w=
ent off after her signal. It kept blinking in his Optics, but he could hold=
 it for the most part. Soon he saw Vulois chasing after her. He caught up t=
o him and saw the evil look in his eyes. (remember still cloaked.) Then he =
spoke, it would seem as if it were coming from everywhere.
      "The leade=
r of Peace so angry? Why is this?"
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fr=
om: logomorph@... 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, =
October 12, 2000 2:55 PM
    Subject: Battera is enraged.


    (If one mor=
e of my char's get's called a bitch, I'm blowing up the 
    planet. Got it=
? Good. Get creative, but knock off the cussing.  I 
    mean, my chars don=
't go calling the other chars names like that. 
    Battera called Vulois a=
 creep.  KitKat refered to Megatron as a 
    jerk.  Come on.  Get creative=
 please. Thank you.)

    ::Battera::
    She flew high and went into a clo=
ud bank. "That inferior piece of 
    Cybertrash.  He just hauled of and hi=
t me for no reason. Huh, I 
    should have let him stayed tied up."  She l=
anded a few miles away 
    from the allience base, just at the boarder of =
thier scanners.  She 
    landed in a tree and rubbed the side of her face.=
  It stung and 
    burned slightly. "He's so high and mighty,he's such a c=
reep. Just hit 
    a bot for no reason. And that ladyhawk feather head,roy=
alty huh? They 
    can all go to the pit. I'm tired of being pushed around=
. So I'm not 
    royalty. So I'm not some special big hot shot from the ou=
ter limits 
    or something."  SHe turned her head back towards the direct=
ion of the 
    alliance base and stuck her tongue out. "FFFBBBBRRRTTT. To =
the 
    darkest corner of the pit with you. Who needs you anyway. I don't.=
" 
    she lightly touches the mark on the side of her face. "I'll make sur=
e 
    I repay you for this."  She sat in the tree. Not realizing she was 
=
    still in the scanner range, she hung upside down in the high branches 
=
    of the tree.  Her wings wrapped around her and tried to conseal 
    he=
rself in the shadow.  "Yeah, who needs them anyway." She kept an 
    eye o=
ut for passing bots, but would remain quiet. She was too mad to 
    think =
correctly and decided to try to calm down before doing anything 
    else. =




          eGroups Sponsor
